heading: Today
temperature: Upper 30s to mid 40s south and in the Champlain Valley, mid 30s to around 40 elsewhere north

heading: Tuesday
text: Chance of late-day showers south and west of I-89.

heading: Wednesday

heading: Thursday
text: Chance of rain or snow showers. Blustery.
